wikitext.*:
'''BAR''' is a [[Primitive Quendian]] [[Sundocarme|root]] signifying "uplift, save, rescue(?)". Its original significance was probably "raise".<ref name=LR>{{LR|Etymologies}}, p. 351 (stem appearing as "BAR-")</ref>

==Derivatives==

*[[Quenya]]: ''varna'' ("safe, protected, secure"); ''varnasse'' ("security"); ''varya-'' ("to protect")<ref name=LR/>
*[[Noldorin|Exilic Noldorin]]: ''berio'' ("to protect")<ref name=LR/>

==See also==

*[[BARAT]]
*[[MBAR]]
